subject: Baseball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: With a win Saturday, Justin Verlander’s 2011 record would have been 25-5, making him only the second pitcher along with Sandy Koufax in 1963 to finish with that mark.
snippet: With a win Saturday, Justin Verlander’s 2011 record would have been 25-5, making him only the second pitcher along with Sandy Koufax in 1963 to finish with that mark.
